titles.title: A bill to require the reimposition of sanctions with respect to the FARC.
A bill to require the reimposition of sanctions with respect to the FARC.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This bill directs the President to designate the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia (FARC) as a foreign terrorist organization and impose sanctions on FARC and any foreign person affiliated with FARC.
